snippet: A mortar shell prompted Israel to respond with what its military called “warning shots” at a Syrian position across the frontier for the first time in 39 years.
abstract: Israel confronts fire along two of its borders, with rockets landing from Gaza and mortar shell landing in the Golan Heights from Syria, prompting it to respond with what its military describes as warning shots at Syrian position across frontier for first time in 39 years.
lead_paragraph: A mortar shell prompted Israel to respond with what its military called “warning shots” at a Syrian position across the frontier for the first time in 39 years.

headline.seo: Israel Fires Into Syria After Shell Hits Military Post
headline.main: Israel Fires Into Syria After Shell Hits Post
headline.print_headline: Israel Fires Into Syria After Shell Hits Post
